front.title: Intended Recipients Attribute for the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS)

abstract.t: This document describes the intended recipients attribute for usewith the Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) [CMS]. The intendedrecipients attribute can be used as a signed attribute or as anauthenticated attribute.This draft is being discussed on the 'ietf-smime' mailing list. Tojoin the list, send a message to <ietf-smime-request@imc.org> withthe single word 'subscribe' in the body of the message. Also, thereis a Web site for the mailing list at <http://www.imc.org/ietf-smime/>.
